Wizard Skills: Skill Trained (Arcana; Choose 6 from any)
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Unified Theory: Can use Arcana in place of Nature, Occultism, or Religion

Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 5; A1: 3 Attack: Arcane Innate: +5 (charisma; trained); Arcane: +8 (intelligence; trained) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 15 (charisma; trained); Arcane: 18 (intelligence; trained)
Spells: Detect Magic (A0 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the school of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Magic Notes:
Arcane Sense: Knows the Detect Magic arcane innate spell; may cast it at 4th level at will
Arcane Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare two additional cantrips each day or add two additional cantrips to repertoire
Drain Bonded Item: (F) Can cast an expended spell using power stored in a possession once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Universalist: Can use Drain Bonded Item once per spell level each day/Knows 1 additional 1st-level spell
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
Unified Theory Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15 and arcana rank (currently 4) >= 4
